channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Identity Summary: New Security Copilot skill within Defender XDR
item.description:
“Can you summarize Defender insights about this user over the last two days?” Microsoft’s latest innovation for Copilot for Security, simplifies SOC teams’ investigation with the new Identity Summary feature within Defender XDR.
Today, we are excited to share details on the new Identity Summary skill, available within the Microsoft Defender XDR and Copilot for Security portals, it provides a natural language summary of user behavioral anomalies and potential misconfigurations. This blog highlights how the summary can uncover discrepancies and security gaps, enabling timely actions to enhance...

item.title: Microsoft Intern Experience - Through the eyes of DART Incident Response (IR) interns
item.description:
Microsoft Intern Experience Blog Series Microsoft DART Incident Response (IR) Internships
The Microsoft Intern Experience occurs during the summer at Microsoft. Interns at Microsoft's Incident Response (IR) customer-facing business, the Detection and Response Team (DART), gain insight into what’s needed to be a cyber incident response investigator - and experience it first-hand with our team of IR threat hunters.
We all agree – the threat landscape is not getting better There are countless statistics about cybercrime. The most alarming is that it continues to be very profitable, rising f...
